title:
What Is that strange sweet chemical smell in the air this past week?

 It reminds me of paper mills in northern Maine. It is literally burning my eyes and making my throat constrict. Does anyone else worry about it? From my reaction I think it must be a health hazard. Thanks for any answers and suggestions on what we can do about it.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



Actually, this previous post at MyReporter.com might answer your
